content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was aiming for a higher price and did not want to continue the negotiation at each offer I made. I made several offers, starting from 500 Euros per month and increasing by 50 Euros each time, but he did not want to continue the negotiation until I made a higher offer.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: How would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 7. There wasn't any dislike, but there wasn't a strong sense of likeability either. It was a straightforward negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation. The landlord was straightforward and maintained a professional demeanor throughout the negotiation process.
name: Yi-Nuo
